pages.title: Lorem Ipsum

contents.title: Intro
contents.content:
## About

Hello, I am a master's student at the department of artificial intelligence at SungKyunKwan University (SKKU). 
My research interests are sentiment analysis and applying it to open-domain chatbot for better human similarity.

contents.title: Education
contents.content:

- **SungKyunKwan University (SKKU)**, South Korea  
  Master's student, Artificial Intelligence, Feb 2021 -
  Advisor: Prof. JinYeong Bak
- **Korea Polytechnic University (KPU)**, South Korea  
  B.S., Computer Engineering, Mar 2017 - Feb 2021
  GPA : 4.17/4.5

contents.title: Intro
contents.content:
## About

Hi. I am DongJun Kang. 
I am a student at Sungkyunkwan University(SKKU). 
My majors are mechanical engineering and computer engineering.
And I'm interested in machine learning, summarization, natural language generation.

If you have any questions, please feel free to contact!

contents.title: Intro
contents.content:
## About

Hello, I am a Master Student at SungKyunKwan University(SKKU), from South Korea. 
My research Interest is Source Code to Text summarization. Like creating a commit message on Github when Neural Network detect code changes.

contents.title: Publications
contents.content:
## Journal Publication

1. Associative Knowledge Graph Using Fuzzy Clustering and Min-Max Normalization in Video Contents
Hyun-Jin Kim, Ji-Won Baek, Kyungyong Chung.
[IEEE Open Access Journal] 2021.
[Link]  [PDF]

2. Optimization of Associative Knowledge Graph using TF-IDF based Ranking Score
Hyun-Jin Kim, Ji-Won Baek, Kyungyong Chung.
[MDPI Applied Sciences] 2020.
[Link]  [PDF]

3. Data Bias Optimization based Association Reasoning Model for Road Risk Detection.
Seong-Eun Ryu, Hyun-Jin Kim, Byung-Kook Koo, Hye-Jeong Kwon, Roy C Park, Kyungyong Chung.
[Journal of the Korea Convergence Society] 2020.
[Link]  [PDF]

## Conference Papers

1. Traffic Knowledge Graph using Associative Document Weight.
Hyun-Jin Kim, Min-Jeong Kim, Ju-Chang Kim, Kyungyong Chung.
[International Conference on Convergence Technology] 2020

2. Association Rule based Video Knowledge Extraction using Object Detection Algorithm.
Hyun-Jin Kim, Hye-Jeong Kwon, Ji-Hye Gwon, Kyongyong Chung.
[Korean Society for Internet Information] 2020.

## About

My research topic is NLG, Open-domain dialogue system and I'm especially interested in personalized dialogue system.
